name: Reliq
description:
A dynamic horror game full of immersive atmosphere and monsters that lurk just beyond the light of your oil lamp. 

You play as a reporter wanting to uncover the truth about the Conjuring of Lady Veronica. As you step foot into the mansion you meet the friendly spirit Mary, who asks for your help to unchain her from the mansion, allowing her to pass on. If you help her, she will help you find and uncover the truth of the Conjuring of Lady Veronica

Controlls-Keyboard and Mouse Only:

  1. Press W, A, S, D to move around.
  2. Press F to turn on/off the Lamp.
  3. Press Left-Mouse Click to use and drop items within the inventory.
  4. Lastly, press the Escape Key to pause the game.
